mapper.select: SELECT wa.id, wa.odd_numbers oddNumbers, wa.start_date startDate, wa.end_date endDate, wa.work_type workType, wa.reminder_date reminderDate, wa.duty_station dutyStation, wa.job_content jobContent, wa.arrange_initiator arrangeInitiator, wa.person_liable personLiable, wa.arrange_supervisor arrangeSupervisor, wa.arrange_state arrangeState, wa.creation_time creationTime, wa.start_time startTime, wa.completion_time completionTime, wa.appraisal_status appraisalStatus, wa.assessment_comments assessmentComments, wa.assessment_time assessmentTime, wa.assessment_people assessmentPeople FROM jr_work_arrange wa GROUP BY wa.creation_time ORDER BY wa.creation_time DESC LIMIT 1;
